title: House Party - Supporter Pack
description: Can't get enough House Party?  Then the House Party - Supporter Pack is for you!  All the House Party devs worked together on to add our own personal flair. There's new content, new cosmetics, the House Party Soundtrack, and maybe one more surprise we think you'll enjoy.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# About House Party - Supporter Pack
<!--text-->
Can't get enough House Party?  Then the House Party - Supporter Pack is for you!  Support Eek! and enjoy this DLC that all the House Party devs worked together on to add our own personal flair.  There's new story content, new cosmetics, new background chatter, the House Party Soundtrack, and we're working on squeezing in one more surprise that we think you'll enjoy. (We'll update this about again soon with more info.)


***New Story Content***

Dive deeper into Ashley's deep-rooted sibling rivalry issues with Madison, and help the girls put aside their differences and work together through a plumbing disaster.  Ashley will be more than grateful for your help.  Trust us.

Help Derek prepare for his new job.  He's trying to impress the new boss (Patrick!?) and can use your help to demonstrate that he's got what it takes.  Like Ashley, Derek will be very grateful for your help!


***New Cutscenes***

Enjoy two brand-spanking new steamy cutscenes featuring Derek and Ashley, but also usable with any characters through the game's console.


***New Background Chatter***

Do you know all of the background chatter lines by heart?  We've included some previously cut lines, and some fresh background chatter lines in this DLC for all original characters. So be on the look out for some fresh background chatters as well in this DLC!


***House Party Soundtrack***

Now you can listen to any of the House Party original songs outside of the game whenever you like!


***New Customization Options***

The House Party - Supporter Pack also includes new clothing and hairstyle customization options for the House Party characters. 

**All Characters:** 

- 2 new hairstyles
- 1 new set of dorky taped glasses

**Female characters: **

- 3 new top options
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG top options
(1 item is compatible with Ashley and the Female Player, the other is compatible with Vickie, Katherine, and Lety)
- 3 new bottom options
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG bottom options
(1 item is compatible with Ashley, Leah, Liz Katz, Madison, and the Female Player, the other is compatible with Vickie, Amy, Lety, and Liz Katz)
- 3 new undershirt options
- 3 new underwear options
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG underwear options
(1 item is compatible with Ashley and the Female Player, the other is compatible with Vickie)
- 3 new shoe options
-  2 redesigned and retextured OG shoe options
(1 item is compatible with Ashley and the Female Player, the other is compatible with Vickie, Ashley, Brittney, Katherine, Lety, Liz Katz, the Female Player, and Rachael) 
- 1 new gloves option (possibly a couple more glove options)
- 1 new knee socks option
- 1 redesigned and retextured OG heart collar option
(This item is compatible with all female characters, except Leah) 
- 1 redesigned and retextured OG stud bracelet option
(This item is compatible with Vickie and Lety) 

**Male characters: **

- 2 new top options
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG top options 
(1 item is compatible with Derek, the other is compatible with Frank, Patrick, and the male player)
- 1 new bottom option
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG bottom options 
(1 item is compatible with Derek, the other is compatible with Frank, Patrick, and the male player)
- 1 new underwear option
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG underwear options 
(1 item is compatible with Derek, the other is compatible with Frank, Patrick, and the male player)
- 1 new shoe option
- 2 redesigned and retextured OG shoe options 
(1 item is compatible with Derek, the other is compatible with Frank, Patrick, and the male player)
- 1 redesigned and retextured OG watch option 
(This item is compatible with Patrick)

All of these items can be customized like other House Party clothing items.  Mix and match these new items and existing items to create incredible character designs!   The transformation options are endless!   
   
Select each item's primary and secondary colors and metallic properties.  Then choose from over 100 patterns and customize the pattern's color, size, rotation, embossing, glow, and metallic properties.  Add a decal to make it even more your own and then share it with the House Party community with our design sharing feature!

See thumbnails of the clothing items available in this DLC below:
